eu.liveandgov.wp1.sensor_miner.sensors

Class SensorThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.liveandgov.wp1.sensor_miner.sensors.SensorThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SensorThread
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Singleton class that holds the sensor thread. This thread is responsible for: startRecording / unregister individual sensors The singleton property makes is easy to start/stop recording via static method calls. Created by hartmann on 9/22/13.
